select menu_id "id", menu_pid "pid", menu_name "text", menu_desc "desc", menu_order "order", menu_url "url", CASE WHEN EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM sc_menu b WHERE b.menu_pid = a.menu_id) THEN 'closed' ELSE 'open' END "state" from sc_menu a where 1 = 1 and menu_pid =#id#
order by menu_order, menu_id
